about_the_game:
Whispering Shadows is not your typical Horror game. Whispering Shadows is a worlds first for video games. Every year throughout Halloween Millions visit Horror theme parks around the world with Universal Studios alone receiving 1.5 million visitors throughout their Halloween event. So what happens when Halloween is over and you want that scare maze/ Horror fix, well most turn to their favourite forms of media being that Movies and Video games. Whispering Shadows is designed to give you that horror fix all year round with constant updates and changes to attractions and mazes so you never know what could be lurking around the next corner.

The Theme Park
The Theme Park is being created in a space of roughly 3 km² with 10 scare attractions on release and a planned 12 scare attractions within the first year. We plan to release at least 1 new scare attraction into the park every month whilst making ongoing changes to current attractions. The park will not just have scare mazes and haunts but also fun and interactive shows to watch and fairground style Halloween themed games to play i.e. A Thrilling show in our graveyard amphitheatre or our Zombie shooting gallery where you can unlock additional content throughout the park.


The Plague Doctors Spinner

Grab a bite at the Diner
The Scare Mazes
We already have 8 scare mazes in place with more to be implemented before release with changes and new mazes every month after release.

The Family: Venture into the foreboding depths of The Family's haunted abode, where the air is thick with an unshakable sense of dread. Brave souls are beckoned by curiosity, enticed by the enigma surrounding this malevolent residence. Whispers permeate the air, tales of the village folk who ventured in and never returned, their fates entwined with the sinister secrets hidden within these walls. Rumours speak of unholy rituals, demonic pacts, and shadows that dance in the moonlight, only daring to emerge when darkness blankets the world. The local community, gripped by fear, hints at unspeakable horrors, the very mention of The Family sending shivers down their spines. As you cross the threshold, every creaking floorboard and flickering candlelight tells a chilling tale. Will you brave the unknown, unravel the mysteries that shroud this ominous mansion, and confront the darkness that resides within The Family's cursed legacy? The choice is yours, but be warned: once you enter, there may be no escape from the haunting secrets that await.


The home of The Family
Carnival of Grins: A chilling journey into the heart of fear, where the echoing laughter of sinister clowns mingles with the screams of the brave souls who dare to enter. As visitors navigate the twisting, dimly lit corridors, they encounter a surreal world of grotesque carnival games and eerie illusions. Sinister clowns, with their painted smiles and malevolent eyes, lurk around every corner, ready to unleash their nightmarish tricks on unsuspecting victims. The air is thick with anticipation, and the line between reality and nightmare blurs in this terrifying maze, leaving visitors questioning what is real and what is an illusion. Will you escape the clutches of these malevolent jesters, or will you become another twisted spectacle in their demented carnival?


The Carnival of Grins
The Backwoods: Enter the heart of terror in "The Backwoods" a spine-chilling maze experience inspired by a gruesome tale from the rural depths. Step into the eerie, dilapidated farmhouse of a deranged family, where the echoes of revving chainsaws fill the air, and the line between hunter and prey blurs into a nightmarish frenzy. As you navigate the labyrinth of decaying rooms and twisted corridors.

Solitary Confinement: The Isolation Experience,' a harrowing journey inside the confines of a stark, unforgiving container. In this immersive encounter, participants find themselves alone in an unsettling, dimly lit space, The silence is deafening, broken only by the sound of your own heartbeat, echoing in the enclosed space. Shadows dance, and the mind plays tricks, blurring the line between reality and imagination. As time stretches, the isolation becomes a tangible presence, testing your sanity and resolve. Will you endure the solitude, or will the confinement break your spirit, leaving you forever changed by the experience?

Tunnel of Despair: Love's Twisted Embrace: where romance and horror entwine in a chilling dance. What appears to be a charming boat ride for couples takes an ominous turn as you glide through dimly lit waters, surrounded by the echoes of haunting whispers and ghostly apparitions. As the boat drifts deeper into the tunnel, the air becomes thick with an inexplicable sense of dread. Shadows flicker, and the once enchanting music distorts into a dissonant melody. Love-struck couples are replaced by ghastly spectre's, their hollow eyes fixated on you, their tragic love stories unfolding in eerie vignettes along the walls.

Labyrinth of the Damned: The Slasher experience where fear takes physical form in the twisting corridors of a forsaken maze. As you step into this nightmarish realm, you find yourself pursued by a notorious serial killer. The maze is alive with the chilling presence of the murderer, who watches your every move, leaving cryptic clues and taunting messages along the way. As you progress, You'll encounter eerily realistic crime scenes, each more terrifying than the last, forcing you to confront the depths of human depravity.


The Slaughter house
Themed Scare Zones: As well as the mazes and attractions the park is littered with themed scare zones. in one area you could be wandering through a Zombie Apocalypse and another A Cursed Village.


The Gloomy Woods, home to the twisted Ghost train
Shows and games: When you step away away from the main attractions to take a breather you will find our side shows dotted around the park along with carnival games and easter egg hunts.

Game Modes
There will be three ways to play Whispering Shadows:

Fear Mode for those that want a challenge and earn there way around the parks attractions. You will start with small amount of cash but will need to earn more via carnival games, Easter egg hunts and challenges. You will need to pay your way onto the rides and scare mazes and will need to keep your 'Fear meter' high enough to be able to make it through the scare mazes.

Adventure Mode this will be for those that want to experience all the park has to offer without being held back. Ride the coasters, play the carnival games, view all the shows, take a tour through all the scare mazes and enjoy a meal free of charge in the Hogs Diner.

4 player Co-op Mode Invite up to 3 friends to join you in your park. Experience all the park has to offer in Adventure Mode with your friends at your side... or for those with a devious side you can control how the scare mazes play out, control the jump scares, layout and lighting while you watch and listen from the comfort of the control room. You can even dress as the scare actors if you want live out that inner Movie serial killer role.

• Animated Blood - Discolored and/or unrealistic depictions of blood
• Blood - Depictions of blood
• Language - Mild to moderate use of profanity
